features: Ease of Cleaning: These power mop pads are sturdy and much thicker than those disposable pads. They are easy to install, adhere to your swiffer power mop better than paper pads, and won't move while mopping. Microfiber fabric has good grip and clean up all kinds of dirt, debris and pet hair, suitable for cleaning most types of floors and walls, such as vinyl, marble, laminate, tile.

Compatible with Swiffer Power Mop: Size 15"x 4.7", these powermop pads have a terry cloth textured side for cleaning and the entire surface of the bottom is a velcro soft side that fits perfectly with Swiffer Power Mop and 13” 14” 15” spray mop. Each mop pad has a hanging hook thus you can remove the used mop pads from the mop without touching it.

Cost Effective Alternatives: These swiffer wet pad refills are a great alternative to the ever-increasing cost of paper refills. Unlike frequent replacment, now you can throw them in the washing machine and reuse them. Thick, soft and durable microfiber mop pads can be used wet and dry condition to save your money. Pacakge includes 4 set of purple mop pads.

High Absorbency: Instead of spreading cleaning solution around, our power mop pads grab the dirt and clean up dry spills and drips quickly so you can clean your floors in less time. Not only are they cost-saving, but they also have great cleaning capabilities and will leave your floors spotless and sparkling, breathing new life into your home.

Washable & No More Disposables: If you're tired of buying paper pads then throwing them into landfills, these reusable swiffer power mop refills do serve as an effective alternative to reduce waste to the environment. Warm tips: It is better not to use fabric softener during wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
reviews.reviewText: The Reusable Mop Refill Pads for Swiffer PowerMop have been a welcome addition to my cleaning routine, offering a sustainable and cost-effective solution to the traditional disposable pads. These reusable pads are designed to fit the Swiffer PowerMop, and they have proven to be both practical and eco-friendly.One of the standout features of these refill pads is their durability. The quality of the material ensures that they withstand multiple washes without losing their effectiveness. This not only contributes to a longer lifespan but also reduces the environmental impact associated with disposable alternatives. The stitching and overall construction of the pads are robust, providing confidence in their ability to handle regular use.The ease of use is another notable aspect. The pads attach seamlessly to the Swiffer PowerMop, and the secure fit ensures that they stay in place during cleaning. The design allows for quick and hassle-free installation and removal, making the overall cleaning process more efficient.In terms of cleaning performance, the reusable pads are comparable, if not superior, to their disposable counterparts. They effectively trap dust, dirt, and debris, leaving floors clean and polished. The microfiber material is particularly adept at picking up finer particles, enhancing the overall cleanliness of the surfaces.The cost savings associated with using reusable pads are evident over time. While the initial investment may be slightly higher, the ability to wash and reuse these pads means less money spent on disposable replacements. This makes them a budget-friendly choice for those looking to minimize ongoing cleaning expenses.From an environmental perspective, the switch to reusable pads is a positive step. Reducing the amount of disposable waste generated from cleaning products aligns with a more sustainable and eco-conscious lifestyle.In conclusion, the Reusable Mop Refill Pads for Swiffer PowerMop offer a practical, durable, and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional disposable pads. Their performance, ease of use, and long-term cost savings make them a worthwhile investment for anyone looking to enhance their cleaning routine while minimizing their ecological footprint.
